title: Soldiers of Odin
summary: Soldiers of Odin (SOO) (Finnish: Odinin sotilaat) is an anti-immigrant group founded in Kemi, Finland, in October 2015. The group was established as a response to thousands of migrants arriving in Finland amid the European migrant crisis.[2][3][4] They call themselves a "patriotic organisation that fights for a Finland" that wants to scare away "Islamist intruders" they say "cause insecurity" and increase crime.[5]
